flavorText: "My falcons are family, as much as any other member of my clan."

foreignData.flavorText: „Meine Falken gehören zur Familie, so wie jedes andere Mitglied meines Klans."
foreignData.name: Falkner-Adeptin
foreignData.text: Immer wenn die Falkner-Adeptin angreift, erzeuge einen getappten und angreifenden 1/1 weißen Vogel-Kreaturenspielstein mit Flugfähigkeit.

foreignData.flavorText: "Mis halcones son mi familia, al igual que cualquier otro miembro de mi clan".
foreignData.name: Halconera experta
foreignData.text: Siempre que la Halconera experta ataque, crea una ficha de criatura Ave blanca 1/1 con la habilidad de volar que está girada y atacando.

foreignData.flavorText: « Mes faucons font partie de ma famille, au même titre que n'importe quel autre membre de mon clan. »
foreignData.name: Experte fauconnière
foreignData.text: À chaque fois que l'Experte fauconnière attaque, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Oiseau avec le vol, engagé et attaquant.

foreignData.flavorText: "I miei falchi sono la mia famiglia, al pari di qualsiasi altro membro del mio clan."
foreignData.name: Falconiera Esperta
foreignData.text: Ogniqualvolta la Falconiera Esperta attacca, crea una pedina creatura Uccello 1/1 bianca con volare TAPpata e attaccante.

foreignData.flavorText: 「隼たちはみな家族。氏族の他の者たちと同じように。」
foreignData.name: 隼使いの達人
foreignData.text: 隼使いの達人が攻撃するたび、飛行を持つ白の１/１の鳥・クリーチャー・トークンを１体、タップ状態かつ攻撃している状態で生成する。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 人間・兵士

foreignData.flavorText: "내 매들은 내 가족이야. 내 부족의 다른 누구와 비교해도 뒤처지지 않지."
foreignData.name: 능숙한 매사냥꾼
foreignData.text: 능숙한 매사냥꾼이 공격할 때마다, 탭되어 공격 중인 비행을 가진 1/1 백색 조류 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignData.flavorText: "Meus falcões são da família, tanto quanto qualquer outro membro do meu clã."
foreignData.name: Adepta Falcoeira
foreignData.text: Toda vez que Adepta Falcoeira atacar, crie uma ficha de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Ave com voar virada e atacando.

foreignData.flavorText: «Мои соколы — моя семья, такая же, как остальные в моем клане».
foreignData.name: Опытная Сокольничья
foreignData.text: Каждый раз, когда Опытная Сокольничья атакует, создайте одну фишку существа 1/1 белая Птица с Полетом повернутой и атакующей.

foreignData.flavorText: 「我与部落伙伴如家人般亲密，我跟手下鹰隼也是如此。」
foreignData.name: 训隼专家
foreignData.text: 每当训隼专家攻击时，派出一个1/1白色，具飞行异能的鸟衍生生物，其为横置且正进行攻击。

foreignData.flavorText: 「我與部落伙伴如家人般親密，我跟手下鷹隼也是如此。」
foreignData.name: 訓隼專家
foreignData.text: 每當訓隼專家攻擊時，派出一個1/1白色，具飛行異能的鳥衍生生物，其為橫置且正進行攻擊。

name: Falconer Adept
originalText: Whenever Falconer Adept attacks, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking.

rulings.text: You choose which player or planeswalker the Bird token is attacking. It doesn't have to be attacking the same player or planeswalker that Falconer Adept is attacking.

Although the Bird is an attacking creature, it was never declared as an attacking creature. This means that abilities that trigger whenever a creature attacks won't trigger when it enters the battlefield attacking.
Any effects that say that the Bird can't attack (such as that of Propaganda) affect only the declaration of attackers. They won't stop the Bird token from entering the battlefield attacking.

text: Whenever Falconer Adept attacks, create a 1/1 white Bird creature token with flying that's tapped and attacking.
